items.name: Training Health Potion
items.customDescription: Recovers 1HP every 5 seconds for the next 120 seconds.

items.customDescription: Third Eye (active skill). Control minion: +1, sense: +1,

items.name: Trainee Bone Spear
items.customDescription: Tiny increase in spear proficiency when equipped.

items.name: Paladin Engeler's Body Armour (silver rank)
items.customDescription: Reduces physical damage taken by 10%, except spears. Endurance +1, Endurance +10%.

items.name: Paladin Engeler's Shield (silver rank)
items.customDescription: Threat increased 20%, Reduce received damage from Demons by 7%, Reduce received damage from Undead by 7%, chance to block 20%.

items.name: Paladin Engeler's Cape (silver rank)
items.customDescription: Increase HP by 315, Increase MP by 225.

items.name: Demon Hunter Necklace
items.customDescription: Reduces physical damage taken by 15, Reduces magical damage taken by 17, Reduce received damage from Demons by 3%

items.customDescription: Reduces physical damage taken by 15, Reduces magical damage taken by 17, Reduce received damage from Demons by 3%

items.customDescription: Reduces physical damage taken by 15, Reduces magical damage taken by 17, Reduce received damage from Demons by 3%

items.name: Demon Hunter Ring
items.customDescription: Reduces physical damage taken by 15, Reduces magical damage taken by 17, Reduce received damage from Demons by 3%

items.name: Toads Skin Jacket
items.customDescription: Has a small chance to poison on contact, dexterity +1.

items.name: Shadow Pirate's Coat
items.customDescription: Hiding in shadows is 40% more effective. +150 water resistance. 2% water resistance.

items.name: Tidus Earring
items.customDescription: Dexterity +9, Swimming speed +5, Can breath underwater for 5 minutes.

items.name: Featureless Deathwood Mask
items.customDescription: Hides the users stats, name and other details.

items.name: Heavenly White Stag Mask
items.customDescription: Magic: +2, Disease resistance + 20%, Mana regeneration + 20%, blessing of 建御雷 [Takemikazuchi].

items.name: Glide Moroha
items.customDescription: Deals +5 ice damage. Ice skills cost 5% less mana, other skills cost 2% less mana.

items.name: Gale Moroha
items.customDescription: Deals +1 wind damage. Attack speed starts at 10% of user maximum speed. Skill cool downs are reduced 3%.

items.name: Niyosho Gakuran
items.customDescription: The male school uniform of Niyosho.

items.name: Otto's Leaky Wand
items.customDescription: Can only be used by Otto. Command +1, Command over plant's +4.

items.name: Jokoto Wakizashi
items.customDescription: A 55cm length short sword. This sword was made long ago, it is very worn.

items.name: Seifuku
items.customDescription: High school sailor outfit worn by female students of Niyosho.

items.name: Autumn Cloak
items.customDescription: Once a day you can cause the leaves on this cloak to swirl around you, obscuring you from sight for one minute.
